amendment.description: Amendment restricts funds from being provided to Mexico unless the agency receiving such funds certifies that Mexico has taken specific anti-narcotics actions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 69 in the Congressional Record of June 4, 1996, to restrict funding in the bill for Mexico, unless the government of Mexico takes certain specific steps to curtail drug trafficking.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Souder amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
